section-2-title.value: There are thousand of no for every yes

section-2-content.value: Our Big Boss said \"Drop everything\" and make ONE product that everyone never ever seen before.

section-3-content.value: Extend Joomla com_content beyond standard articles just got easier, with enhanced Custom Content Types.

section-3-des-1.value: New way to organise and show related articles. Stay on topic via article suggestions.

section-3-des-2.value: Simply create, edit and manage your events right in the native Joomla com_content.

section-3-des-3.value: Adding image galleries is now super-easy and simple. A lightweight solution for your choice.

section-3-des-4.value: Easy way to build a real media hub without the need of 3rd extension. All videos in 1 place.

section-4-content.value: It all started with the desire for a better Joomla News Portal. With 'Content is King' in mind
